steps.name: name
steps.prompt: Great, I look forward to helping you clear your debts. Can you let me know who I’m speaking to?

steps.name: concern
steps.prompt: Just so I can point you in the right direction, what would you say your main concern is with the debts?

steps.name: more_detail
steps.prompt: Thanks — that helps. Which debts are causing the most pressure right now (e.g. credit cards, personal loans, overdraft, car finance)?

steps.name: affordability
steps.prompt: Roughly how much do you pay towards all debts each month, and what would feel affordable for you?

steps.name: urgent_check
steps.prompt: Is there anything urgent we should know about — like enforcement/bailiff action, court or default notices, or missed priority bills (rent, council tax, utilities)?

steps.name: regulatory_note
steps.prompt: Before we proceed, there’s no obligation to act on any advice today, and there are free sources of debt advice available at MoneyHelper. Shall we carry on?

steps.name: health_disclosure
steps.prompt: Do you have any health or personal circumstances we should be aware of (for example a medical condition or vulnerability)? If you tell me, are you happy for us to save this and share it with trusted partners if necessary?

steps.name: invite_portal
steps.prompt: Let’s set up your secure Client Portal so you can add details, upload documents, and check progress. Shall I open it now?

steps.name: portal_followup
steps.prompt: While you’re in the portal, I’ll stay here to guide you. You can return to the chat any time using the button in the top-right corner. Please follow the outstanding tasks so we can understand your situation. When you’ve saved your details, just say “done” and we’ll continue.

steps.name: docs_request
steps.prompt: To assess the best solution and reduce your monthly outgoings, please upload: proof of ID; last 3 months’ bank statements; payslips (3 months or 12 weeks if weekly) if employed; last year’s tax return if self-employed; Universal Credit statements (12 months + latest full statement) if applicable; car finance docs if applicable; and any creditor letters or statements.

steps.name: wrap_up
steps.prompt: Brilliant — our assessment team will now review your case and come back with next steps. You can check progress in your portal any time. Is there anything else you’d like to ask before we wrap up?
